posts.name: Boccalone Salumeria
posts.note: Panini and cured meats are on the takeaway menu at this tiny deli in the Ferry Building. If they still have it you should get a Salumi Cone which is a sampling of their cured meats.

posts.name: Radio Africa and Kitchen
posts.note: Market-fresh Ethiopian and American dishes are served with beer and wine in cheerful surrounds.
